definition: the mistake of misrepresenting the facts
details:
noun
- the mistake of misrepresenting the facts
- the act of distorting something so it seems to mean something it was not intended to mean
= synonyms: overrefinement
- a change for the worse
= synonyms: deformation
- an optical phenomenon resulting from the failure of a lens or mirror to produce a good image
= synonyms: aberration
- a change (usually undesired) in the waveform of an acoustic or analog electrical signal
- a shape resulting from distortion
= synonyms: distorted shape
